content: Can Terminated/Inactive members request data from the payer via third party applications or is it only for the current/active enrollees?
No sure. I think it is only for current members, but there should be a way for the data to transfer from the previous payer(s) to the current one
Yes for payer to payer data exchange active and inactive both apply. Want to confirm on the Patient Access API data request via Third party app
Yes. What I meant is that if the data moves from payer to payer there is no real reason for a member to try to connect to its previous payers to get data, because the data will be at its current one

Kapil Bharti said:

Can Terminated/Inactive members request data from the payer via third party applications or is it only for the current/active enrollees?

There is a link to davinci's questions/CMS' responses floating around here. I will attempt find it and repost here.

Here are the links to both the DaVinci (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/DVP/Da+Vinci) and CARIN (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CAR/CMS+Patient+Access+API+%3A+Questions+and+Answers?moved=true) CMS Q&As regarding the final rule
